sentence: "It's something that you can beat," Ron DeSantis said of a breast cancer diagnosis.
author: Kimberly Leonard
title: Casey DeSantis says her husband, Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis, 'picked me up literally and figuratively' and went to all her chemo treatments
